description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，抗日战争时期著名将领。曾率领中国远征军在缅甸作战，取得仁安羌大捷等胜利，有“东方隆美尔”之称。国共内战期间在东北战场有出色表现，后赴台湾负责训练新军。1955年因孙立人兵变案被蒋中正软禁长达33年，直至1988年获释。
description.en: A two-star general of the Republic of China Army, a famous general during the Second Sino-Japanese War. He led the Chinese Expeditionary Force in Burma, achieving victories such as the Battle of Yenangyaung, earning him the nickname 'Rommel of the East'. He performed outstandingly in the Northeast China theater during the Chinese Civil War and later went to Taiwan to train new troops. In 1955, he was placed under house arrest for 33 years by Chiang Kai-shek due to the Sun Li-jen Incident, and was released in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名高等学府，孙立人于1923年在此完成庚子赔款留美预科学习。
description.en: A prestigious Chinese university where Sun Li-jen completed his preparatory studies for the Boxer Indemnity Scholarship Program in 1923.

description.zh-cn: 美国著名公立大学，孙立人于1925年获得该校土木工程学士学位。
description.en: A renowned public university in the United States, from which Sun Li-jen obtained a Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 美国著名军事院校，孙立人于1927年获得该校文学士学位。
description.en: A prestigious military college in the United States, from which Sun Li-jen obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、外交家、金融家，曾任财政部部长。因赏识留美军人，提拔孙立人加入其创建的财政部税警总团。
description.en: A politician, diplomat, and financier of the Republic of China who served as Minister of Finance. He admired American-educated military officers and recruited Sun Li-jen into the Salt Gabelle Brigade he established.

description.zh-cn: 由财政部长宋子文创建的精锐部队，孙立人在此开始其军事生涯。
description.en: An elite unit founded by Minister of Finance T. V. Soong, where Sun Li-jen began his military career.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战缅甸战役中的一场关键战斗，孙立人率领新38师113团以少胜多，解救了被日军围困的数千名英军，此役使孙立人名声大噪。
description.en: A key battle in the Burma Campaign of World War II, where Sun Li-jen led the 113th Regiment of the New 38th Division to victory against superior Japanese forces, rescuing thousands of besieged British troops. This battle brought Sun international fame.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，黄埔军校一期毕业生。在缅甸战役撤退和东北剿共期间，与孙立人将帅不和，矛盾严重。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Republic of China Army and a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy. During the retreat from Burma and the Northeast Campaign, he had serious conflicts and disagreements with Sun Li-jen.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任中华民国总统。虽曾因孙立人战功予以表彰，但因孙并非黄埔系且与美国关系密切而心存猜忌，最终以“孙立人兵变案”为由将其软禁。
description.en: A statesman and military leader of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Republic of China. Although he commended Sun Li-jen for his military achievements, he harbored suspicion due to Sun's non-Whampoa background and close ties with the United States, eventually placing him under house arrest over the 'Sun Li-jen Incident'.

nodes.id: 国民革命军新编第一军

zh-cn: 国民革命军新编第一军

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军在第二次中缅印作战期间和第二次国共内战中的主力部队之一，孙立人曾任军长，号称“天下第一军”。
description.en: One of the main forces of the National Revolutionary Army during the Second Burma Campaign and the Chinese Civil War. Sun Li-jen served as its commander, and it was known as the 'First Army Under Heaven'.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军的一个师团，号称“丛林作战之王”，在缅北战役中被孙立人率领的中国驻印军予以毁灭性打击。
description.en: A division of the Imperial Japanese Army, known as the 'King of Jungle Warfare'. It was dealt a devastating blow by the Chinese Army in India led by Sun Li-jen during the Northern Burma Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国共产党和中国人民解放军重要领导人。在国共内战东北战场上，其所率部队与孙立人的新一军多次交战。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and a key leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Liberation Army. In the Northeast China theater of the Chinese Civil War, his troops frequently clashed with Sun Li-jen's New 1st Army.

description.zh-cn: 国共内战期间在东北发生的一场重要战役。孙立人指挥新一军在3天内攻克四平，击退林彪部队。
description.en: An important battle in Northeast China during the Chinese Civil War. Sun Li-jen commanded the New 1st Army to capture Siping within 3 days, repelling Lin Biao's forces.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。在孙立人被调离东北后，曾开庆祝会并称孙为“我们唯一的敌人”。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. After Sun Li-jen was transferred from Northeast China, Mao reportedly held a celebration and referred to Sun as 'our only enemy'.

description.zh-cn: 1955年中华民国政府指控孙立人部属郭廷亮预谋发动兵变的一起政治案件。此案导致孙立人被革职并遭长期软禁，其众多亲信部属亦受牵连入狱。后被证实为一宗冤案。
description.en: A political case in 1955 where the government of the Republic of China accused Sun Li-jen's subordinate Guo Ting-liang of plotting a coup. The incident led to Sun's dismissal and long-term house arrest, and many of his associates were imprisoned. It was later proven to be a miscarriage of justice.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，蒋中正之子，曾任中华民国总统。他所主管的政工系统与孙立人有隙，并在孙立人兵变案中扮演了关键角色，向蒋中正构陷孙立人。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, son of Chiang Kai-shek, and former President of the ROC. The political warfare system he supervised was in conflict with Sun Li-jen, and he played a key role in the Sun Li-jen Incident, framing Sun to Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 孙立人的部属，在“孙立人兵变案”中被指控为匪谍并预谋兵变，成为案件的核心人物。
description.en: A subordinate of Sun Li-jen, he was accused of being a communist spy and plotting a coup in the 'Sun Li-jen Incident', becoming the central figure of the case.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任副总统。在孙立人兵变案中，被蒋中正指定为九人调查委员会主任委员，其调查结果最终导致孙立人被革职。
description.en: A politician and military leader of the Republic of China who served as Vice President. In the Sun Li-jen Incident, he was appointed by Chiang Kai-shek as the chairman of a nine-member investigation committee, whose findings ultimately led to Sun's dismissal.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将。1949年曾邀请孙立人至东京会谈，表示美国希望孙承担防卫台湾的责任并愿提供支持。
description.en: A five-star general in the United States Army. In 1949, he invited Sun Li-jen to Tokyo for a meeting, expressing that the United States hoped Sun would take responsibility for Taiwan's defense and was willing to provide support.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，曾任国防部长。1988年蒋经国逝世后，下令解除对孙立人长达33年的软禁。
description.en: A four-star general of the Republic of China Army who served as Minister of National Defense. After Chiang Ching-kuo's death in 1988, he ordered the release of Sun Li-jen from his 33-year house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。在孙立人逝世后，颁发褒扬令以表彰其功勋。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. After Sun Li-jen's death, he issued a presidential citation to honor his contributions.

description.zh-cn: 孙立人的元配妻子。
description.en: Sun Li-jen's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 孙立人的第二位妻子。
description.en: Sun Li-jen's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 孙立人的妾侍，为孙立人诞下四名子女。
description.en: Sun Li-jen's concubine, who gave birth to his four children.

description.zh-cn: 孙立人于1914年考取清华学校庚子赔款留美预科，1923年毕业。
description.en: Sun Li-jen was admitted to the Tsinghua School's Boxer Indemnity Scholarship Program in 1914 and graduated in 1923.

degree.en: Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering

description.zh-cn: 宋子文赏识拥有美国留学背景的孙立人，并提拔他进入自己创建的财政部税警总团担任军官。
description.en: T. V. Soong admired Sun Li-jen for his American educational background and promoted him to be an officer in the Salt Gabelle Brigade that he founded.

position.zh-cn: 第二支队上校司令兼第四团团长
position.en: Colonel, Commander of the 2nd Detachment and concurrently Commander of the 4th Regiment

description.zh-cn: 孙立人率领新三十八师113团在仁安羌之战中以少胜多，解救了七千余名被困英军，取得大捷。
description.en: Sun Li-jen led the 113th Regiment of the New 38th Division to a major victory in the Battle of Yenangyaung, defeating a larger force and rescuing over 7,000 trapped British soldiers.

description.zh-cn: 仁安羌大捷使孙立人蜚声国际，被英美军方誉为“东方隆美尔”，并获多国勋章。
description.en: The victory at Yenangyaung brought Sun Li-jen international fame, earning him the nickname 'Rommel of the East' from British and American military circles, as well as medals from several countries.

description.zh-cn: 在缅甸战役撤退路线问题上，孙立人拒绝服从杜聿明穿越野人山的命令，选择撤往印度，避免了部队的重大损失。在东北战场期间，两人作为上下级将帅不和，矛盾激化。
description.en: Regarding the retreat route in the Burma Campaign, Sun Li-jen refused Du Yuming's order to cross the Hukawng Valley, choosing instead to retreat to India, thus avoiding heavy casualties. During the Northeast Campaign, the two had severe conflicts as superior and subordinate commanders.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次中缅印作战中，孙立人率领新三十八师和新一军在胡康河谷、孟关等地重创日军第18师团。
description.en: During the Second Burma Campaign, Sun Li-jen led the New 38th Division and the New 1st Army to inflict heavy damage on the Japanese 18th Division in areas like the Hukawng Valley and Maingkwan.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战的东北战场上，孙立人率领的新一军与林彪的东北民主联军是主要对手，双方在四平等地多次激战。
description.en: In the Northeast China theater of the Chinese Civil War, Sun Li-jen's New 1st Army and Lin Biao's Northeast Democratic United Army were primary adversaries, engaging in fierce battles in places like Siping.

description.zh-cn: 孙立人返国后立即指挥新一军，于3日内攻克四平，击退林彪部队。
description.en: Upon his return to China, Sun Li-jen immediately took command of the New 1st Army and captured Siping within three days, repelling Lin Biao's forces.

description.zh-cn: 由于将帅不和，杜聿明屡次向蒋介石批评孙立人，最终导致孙被调离东北，解除兵权。
description.en: Due to their conflict, Du Yuming repeatedly criticized Sun Li-jen to Chiang Kai-shek, which ultimately led to Sun being transferred from the Northeast and stripped of his command.

description.zh-cn: 麦克阿瑟邀请孙立人至东京会谈，表示美国希望孙承担防卫台湾的责任并愿提供支持。
description.en: MacArthur invited Sun Li-jen to Tokyo for talks, expressing that the United States hoped Sun would take responsibility for Taiwan's defense and was willing to provide support.

description.zh-cn: 该政治案件导致孙立人被革除总统府参军长职务，并被长期软禁达33年。
description.en: This political case led to Sun Li-jen's dismissal from his position as Chief Aide-de-Camp to the President and his house arrest for 33 years.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正以“孙立人兵变案”为由，将孙立人革职并下令将其长期软禁。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek used the 'Sun Li-jen Incident' as a pretext to dismiss Sun from his post and order his long-term house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国向蒋中正构陷孙立人，认为其威胁到蒋家权力，主张拔除其军权，并在孙立人兵变案中扮演了关键角色。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo framed Sun Li-jen to Chiang Kai-shek, believing he threatened the Chiang family's power, and advocated for stripping him of his military authority, playing a key role in the Sun Li-jen Incident.

description.zh-cn: 陈诚担任调查“郭廷亮匪谍案”的九人委员会主任委员，其调查结果直接导致孙立人被革职。
description.en: Chen Cheng served as the chairman of the nine-member committee investigating the 'Guo Ting-liang spy case', and the committee's findings directly led to Sun Li-jen's dismissal.

description.zh-cn: 郭廷亮是孙立人的部属，其“匪谍案”是引发孙立人被整肃的直接导火索。
description.en: Guo Ting-liang was a subordinate of Sun Li-jen, and his 'spy case' was the direct trigger for the purge against Sun.

description.zh-cn: 时任国防部长郑为元在蒋经国逝世后下令解除对孙立人的软禁，恢复其自由。
description.en: Then-Minister of National Defense Cheng Wei-yuan, after the death of Chiang Ching-kuo, ordered the lifting of Sun Li-jen's house arrest, restoring his freedom.

description.zh-cn: 在孙立人逝世后，时任总统李登辉颁发褒扬令以表彰其功勋。
description.en: After Sun Li-jen's death, then-President Lee Teng-hui issued a presidential citation to honor his contributions.
